LanguageData:
Miscellaneous<--> Show settings Adjust
Displayed in world settings page<--> Alien Weights Select setting... Override starting alien pawnkinds
Misc window titles<--> Faction exclusion
Misc window descriptions<--> Factions that will never have their pawnkind races overridden by this mod. Useful for existing monoracial or pseudodiverse factions (Note: this setting is general).
